title: Ariokan
description:
Ariokan is the online collectible card game where players can create new official (and balanced) cards at any time to invent new combos and break the "meta".

Generated cards can be unlocked by other players, contributing to an ever-growing library of cards, factions and combos!
longDescription:
<!--clickableImage-->
[![Ariokan-xce0a](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-xce0a.gif)](https://prelaunch.playariokan.com/14)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **The game in a nutshell**
<!--text-->
Bring your opponent's life points to 0, or make them run out of cards.

Manage your Mana, Minions and Spells, and complete objectives to summon powerful Legends that can turn the tides of the match.

Exploit the sinergies of your God's Faction, and deal the fatal blow!

Use what you learnt to invent new cards that make your deck better, and become the smartest duelist in the world!

Also:

- No floodgates, no 10-minutes turns: you get to play and have fun
- Bring your characters into Ariokan's universe. Everything is canon!
- Try decks you don't own against the AI before unlocking them
- Craft a card once, use it everywhere: no need to unlock multiple copies
- A vibrant community with tournaments and competitive seasons
- Modding!
- No "pay to win"

<!--image-->
![Ariokan-6suxc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-6suxc.gif)

<!--image-->
![Ariokan-dgt9t](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-dgt9t.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Create your cards. Invent combos. Break the Meta**
<!--text-->
Forget about facing the same decks over and over: in Ariokan, you have the power to **create your cards** from scratch, **give life** to your original characters, and **break the Meta**. 

And if you prefer to explore existing strategies, there are 4000+ existing cards waiting for you.

<!--image-->
![Ariokan - The CCG where players can create their own custom cards and unleash their creativity](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-1p9q2.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Unleash your creativity**
<!--text-->
With the **in-game Cards Editor**, you can combine the effects and keywords of 8 different Factions to create balanced cards that make your deck, and strategy, truly unique.

With more than 27 billions combinations at your disposal, you'll never run out of options!

<!--image-->
![Ariokan-5v8x5](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-5v8x5.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **No floodgates, no 10-minutes turns**
<!--text-->
**Cards are auto-balanced** (i.e. no "I win" card), and **immediately available** worldwide to all players that want to unlock them.

<!--image-->
![Ariokan-1ycwk](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-1ycwk.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Play with your fantasies**
<!--text-->
With every card you make, you shape Ariokan and its universe:

You can add artworks and lore so each card tells your story, adding a **personal touch to your deck**. 

You're more than a player: you're part of the game!

And with every new card, new strategies arise, making Ariokan a game with fresh, new content every day.

<!--image-->
![Ariokan-ode12](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-ode12.gif)

<!--image-->
![Ariokan-xovr8](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-xovr8.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Modding: make your own game modes**
<!--text-->
You can tweak the game rules when you play with your friends, and discover new ways to have fun.

Invent game modes, share them with other players, and play together: the only limit is your creativity.

Will you become the God of games?

<!--image-->
![Ariokan-14ncb](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-14ncb.png)

<!--image-->
![Ariokan-1tw4b](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-1tw4b.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Getting started
<!--text-->
[Support the closed beta and join the community](https://prelaunch.playariokan.com/14), or if you want to wait until the Open Beta begins, wishlist it on the Epic Store page (the one you're reading).

It doesn't matter if you are a seasoned card game player or if Ariokan will be your first, you're welcome.

Here's what awaits you:

- No floodgates, no 10-minutes turns: you get to play and have fun
- Bring your characters into Ariokan's universe. Everything is canon!
- Try decks you don't own against the AI before unlocking them
- Craft a card once, use it everywhere: no need to unlock multiple copies
- A vibrant community with tournaments and competitive seasons
- Modding!
- No "pay to win"
- No NFTs, Blockchain, or similar

<!--clickableImage-->
[![Ariokan-1roti](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/643caff541bf470fad6f0bfb86118e80/ariokan-1roti.gif)](https://discord.gg/DXDasN4rPb)
